title: Serverless Document Processing and Identification using Textract and Comprehend with CDK
description: To analyse and identify the uploaded document whether it is a valid Government ID. Implemented in CDK

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This sample project demonstrates how to analyze and identify the uploaded document as a valid government issued ID. Implemented with CDK (Python)

bullets.text: Document Detection with Textract and Comprehend

text: See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.

authors.name: Paul Kannan
authors.bio: I am a Technical Account Manager, Serverless Developer, DevOps & Big Data Architect. I specialize in architecting and developing Serverless solutions.
